rows.label: qev087604_MSG0001
rows.name: Thank goodness. Everyone seemed so happy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0002
rows.name: The bond between Wrothians runs deep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0003
rows.name:
Not being able to care for our comrades
has been a heavy weight...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0004
rows.name: Warriors of Earth, you have my thanks for your aid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0005
rows.name: From this day forth, know that the Wrothians stand with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0006
rows.name: Thank you, Your Highness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0007
rows.name: However![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0008
rows.name: This pact lives only as long as the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0009
rows.name: Once they expire, so, too, does this alliance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0010
rows.name:
Mira is a harsh land. Should our survival
mean your doom, it must be so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0024
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0023
rows.name:
Say you'll cross that bridge
when you come to it.

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0022
rows.name: Laugh

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0021
rows.name: Tell Ga Jiarg you would relish the challenge.

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0020
rows.name: Muse

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0019
rows.name:
Wonder if the alliance might
last longer than Ga Jiarg thinks.

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0011
rows.name: Or burn it, if we must.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0012
rows.name: What? You guys can't be serious![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0013
rows.name: Team Tatsu much stronger than new friends![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0014
rows.name: Heh. Why do you think I'm looking forward to it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0015
rows.name: What? You guys can't be serious![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0016
rows.name:
If we remain allies, it will be because
we face an enemy that demands it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0017
rows.name: A welcome prospect for any Wrothian.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087604_MSG0018
rows.name:
It's not welcome at all!
Let's all just be friends because...well, just because![ST:wait ]
